definition: elaborately or excessively ornamented, showy tropical tree or shrub native to Madagascar
details:
adjective
- elaborately or excessively ornamented
= example: elaborately or excessively ornamented
= synonyms: aureate
- marked by ostentation but often tasteless
= synonyms: showy
noun
- showy tropical tree or shrub native to Madagascar
= synonyms: flame tree, royal poinciana, peacock flower
